指導上手\nプロデュースでスキルカードを400回強化:
Skillful Guidance
Enhance Skill Cards 400 times in Production
指針を○〆強気に変更する\nすでに○〆強気の場合、2段階目になる\r\n\n▼1:
Change the Guideline to ○〆Aggressive.
If already in ○〆Aggressive, it will enter the 2nd stage.

▼Stage 1
Increases Score Increase and ○〆Stamina Consumption by 100%.

▼Stage 2
Increases Score Increase by 150% and Stamina Consumption by 100%.
Consumes 1 Stamina per Skill Card used.

Switch Guideline to ○〆Confident.
If already ○〆Confident, it moves to Phase 2.

▼Phase 1
Parameter increase and stamina consumption increase by 100%.

▼Phase 2
Parameter increase by 150%, stamina consumption increases by 100%.
Each Skill Card use consumes 1 ○〆Stamina.
指針を○〆温存に変更する\nすでに○〆温存の場合、2段階目になる\r\n\n▼1:
Change the Guideline to ○〆Conserve.
If already in ○〆Conserve, it will enter the 2nd stage.

▼Stage 1
Decreases Score Increase and Stamina Consumption by 50%.
When canceled: ○〆Enthusiasm+5, ○〆Skill Card usage count +1.

▼Stage 2
Decreases Score Increase and Stamina Consumption by 75%.
When canceled: ○〆Enthusiasm+8, ○〆Energy+5, ○〆Skill Card usage count +1.

Switch Guideline to ○〆Preserve.
If already ○〆Preserve, it moves to Phase 2.

▼Phase 1
Parameter increase and stamina consumption decrease by 50%.
When canceled, ○〆Enthusiasm +5 and ○〆Skill Card usage +1.

▼Phase 2
Parameter increase and stamina consumption decrease by 75%.
When canceled, ○〆Enthusiasm +8, ○〆Energy +5, and ○〆Skill Card usage +1.
授業とおでかけでは\n選択肢に応じて効果が変わります。\n消費する内容と発動する:

the effects change depending on your choices.

and make choices according to the situation.
